channel.title: Server Staff and Testing Required
channel.description:
Hi there, I've decided to upload a server I've been working on. I didn't create it or it's client, I just edited it. Donations won't be accepted and credit is given where due. This server is just for fun at the minute, but maybe in the future I'll fix it up properly.
The main focuses of this server and selling point would be that it's of course PK based, but Drop Parties will be hosted regularly and players can also host there own. The server has working PVM including a variety of bosses, and minigames. Staffzone seems to be unavailable, but donators island and ownerzone are working. Owner zone will be available to Co Owner and Head Admin. Please feel free to download and test drive. There are no players at this time, but I'll help out as best I can :P Many many thanks. Your Gracious Host - NiallSpoon
ShankPK Client and Cache as .rar [url=http://www.filedropper.com/shankpk]http://www.filedropper.com/shankpk[/url]
I ran a scan with Norton and exported the results. Here they are: [spoiler] Scan Statistics: Scan Start: Local: 22/03/2016 14:39 UTC: 22/03/2016 14:39 Scan Time: 30 seconds Scan Targets: C:\Users\Niall\Desktop\RSPS\First try\Cache\ShankPK.rar Counts: Total items scanned: 3,074 - Files & Directories: 3,074 - Registry Entries: 0 - Processes & Start-up Items: 0 - Network & Browser Items: 0 - Other: 0 - Trusted Files: 0 - Skipped Files: 0
Total security risks detected: 0 Total items resolved: 0 Total items that require attention: 0
Resolved Threats: No risks have been resolved
Unresolved Threats: No unresolved risks [/spoiler]

item.title: Server Staff and Testing Required
item.dc:creator: @NurlDurp NurlDurp
item.description:
@NurlDurp wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:555024”]3,074 files in your .rar file?
What, did you rar the entire unjar’d client with the cache?[/quote]

Yes, I am very new to this whole thing. I’ll have a look into how to do that. Thank you for the advice

Read full topic
